attributes.title: Do not download this app!
attributes.review: This app is terrible. At first I thought it would function like a normal app but due to to the glitches and issues it doesn’t function. The app admits a high pitch ringing noise that hurts. The sound was so terrible it left my partially deaf in both ears. Be warned do not download this terrible app.

attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review: This app is so trash and has nothing but propaganda, this is what true fake news is. This app should be taken down because it’s give out misleading information. Trump doesn’t know how to run a country and most definitely can’t even make a decent app.

attributes.title: It wiped my phone data
attributes.review: I do not know what everyone is talking about with the Gen z thing, but this app completely wiped my phone data! I’m sorry to say, but trump has costed me A LOT of money into buy a new phone and supplies for it. I am not voting for him nor will be voting for him ever again. This is unbelievable.

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible app
attributes.review: The quality of the app was not well thought out and my mood did not get better when i opened the app and saw a oopma lompa standing there..im not sure if someone hacked into my account to put that guy there but that adds on to how bad this app is put together

attributes.title: Hacked
attributes.review: You see, i really really really wanted to know what Donald trump could possibly be planning for the 2020 election but after hours of waiting for the app to download, it kept crashing when i opened it. now my phone is all wonky. too bad i’ll have to leave this 1 star review

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: This app is so bad. When I opened it hot cheeto heads started popping up everywhere🤢THIS APP NEEDS TO BE DELETED RIGHT AWAY OR ELSE THE OOMPA LOOMPA ARE GOING TO TAKE OVER🤭😭🤡 This app also crashes my phone and make my phone have several bugs! EARLIER IT MAD SOMEONE THROW UP!!!!!😤😤 this app is disgusting and disrespectful towards all races and ethnicities. DONT DOWNLOAD THE APP!! happy birthday Trump I hope it’s your last🧚‍♂️💫💖

attributes.title: Trash 😡
attributes.review: I was so excited to open this app, but then when my grandmother saw it, she took my phone away and then when she pressed on the app she died! TRASH! She unfortunately died due to the hateful, racist, misogynistic, pedophilic, xenophobic, and sexist trates of Tronald Dump running through her veins and giving her a heart attack. May she rest in pieces. BLM ✨❤️🥰👋🎉😍🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻‍♂️

attributes.title: 🧚🏽‍♂️ it didn’t change my mind
attributes.review: The App it was just so slow. My dog hated it. I tried using this app while walking my pet fish and idk it wasn’t good. Rafter downloading this app I slowly started to turn into a clown every time I looked in the mirror. It was quiet scary. The target app is so much easier to use 🧚🏽‍♂️🥰✨

attributes.title: Ew 🧽
attributes.review: I downloaded this because a friend told me the fbi would come to my house and give me a hug. It’s been forever and I haven’t received a hug. I’m beyond disappointed with the trump administration and the app they produced.

attributes.title: A demon possessed me cause of this app 😱😔
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to support our amazing orange 😸but then a demon was invading my phone!!!! This usually never happens when I use the app, but I had to go get holy water which was a lot of money, I had to go get salt, I had to escort it out of my home. Honestly not cool Cheeto 😔🖐. r-r-r-roll💿up⬆️to2️⃣the🤩party🥳with🧶my🧚crazy🤪pink💝wig💇‍♀️ OMG ITS POSSESING ME
